title: Taiwan Imports
description: Imports in Taiwan increased to 36949.26 USD Million in October from 32510.70 USD Million in September of 2022. Imports in Taiwan averaged 13071.17 USD Million from 1981 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 39662.33 USD Million in May of 2022 and a record low of 1203.70 USD Million in February of 1983. A lack of natural resources had made Taiwan dependent on imports. Taiwan imports mostly parts of electronic products (18.2% of total), mineral products (15.2%), machinery (12.4%), chemicals (10.8%) and base metals (7.3%). Main import partners are Mainland China & Hong Kong (19.6% of total), Japan (17.6%), Europe (12.6%), USA (12.4%), ASEAN countries (11.8%) and Middle East (7.7%). This page provides - Taiwan Imports - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Ministry of Finance, R.O.C.
